description: Sovereyn - Distributed AI inference network (throne daemon + reign CLI)

Write-Host '  â€¢ reign  - The CLI tool'

Write-Host '  reign dev status       # Developer dashboard'
Write-Host '  reign node status      # Operator dashboard'
